attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, wish politicians to debate their own wages.
We wish for all quango's related to the setting of M.P.s wages dissolved.
We wish, in this time of austerity, a 10% reduction in politicians wages.
We also wish for a further 10% of politicians wages to become performance related.
We also ask that politicians wages become linked to all civil servants pay, in that all pay rises for civil servants are added together and a mean average of this figure become the politicians pay rise for that specific year.
We ask that this become enshrined in law so future politicians cannot rescind or remove this as it is the will of the goverened!
